name: Nubarron: The adventure of an unlucky gnome
descr:
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/414160/extras/page_bg_raw.jpg?t=1667224891[/img]

[list][li] A Gorgeous Digital Painted Fantasy World
[/li][li] An Amazing Orchestral Bgm
[/li][li] A fantasy story with a love-hate relationship between Gnome and his Cloud
[/li][li] A following Cloud that can be used to throw lightnings to solve puzzles and get rid of enemies
[/li][li] Angry Cloud sequences that challenges the player to keep moving to avoid the aimed-at-gnome lightnings
[/li][li] Neutral Cloud sequences that allows the player to aim where to strike the lightning while also escaping the aimed-at-gnome lightnings
[/li][li] Happy Cloud sequences that allows the player to fully control the Cloud without having to worry about aimed-at-gnome lightnings
[/li][li] Classic platformer challenges and puzzles
[/li][li] Boss fights[/li][/list]
